name: get_teams_and_players
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool league_of_legends_esports.
Tool description: This api gives you all of the lol esports leagues , vods, tournaments, match , game , event details with videos , scheadule , standings, teams and their players. And live game score.
API description: Fetches teams and players information from the League of Legends Esports API. This function can filter results based on the team name or team ID.

name.description: The name of the team to filter by. Defaults to None.

is_id.description: The ID of the team to filter by. Defaults to 'lng-esports'.
